content: *berroco yarns for this pattern have been discontinued directions are still available * *po boy is a simple square-shaped purse crocheted in trilogy we ve added a handy outside pocket and a readymade braided leather handle berroco * skill level easy materials berroco trilogy 50 grs 3 balls #7609 edinburgh rust crochet hook size 6 00 mm j or size to obtain gauge one 1 1/4 button one 1 1/4 wide x 17 long braided leather handle with ring at each end from m & j trimming safety pin for marker
